With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! programme.title: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: It's called Borealopelta, a recently discovered, 110 million year old dinosaur that's so well preserved, it looks like it could've been walking the Earth just last month. When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. programme.title: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. programme.title: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Wherever man is found, members of the crow family are nearby, watching. Since time immemorial, they have followed the hunters, farmers, soldiers and persecutors, scratching the soil in gardens, ploughed fields, battlefields... Crows and their cousins study us, passing on the knowledge gleaned to their offspring. Chronicle of an inquisition.
programme.desc: Wherever man is found, members of the crow family are nearby, watching. Since time immemorial, they have followed the hunters, farmers, soldiers and persecutors, scratching the soil in gardens, ploughed fields, battlefields... Crows and their cousins study us, passing on the knowledge gleaned to their offspring. Chronicle of an inquisition.

programme.title: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.
programme.desc: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.

programme.title: Hélène admits that eleven years earlier, Marina had run away after surprising her with her lover. And that was when she was kidnapped. Superintendent Victoire Eberhart discovers that the man who has been pulling the strings since the beginning is none other than Paul, her lieutenant and Laurent's best friend.
programme.desc: Hélène admits that eleven years earlier, Marina had run away after surprising her with her lover. And that was when she was kidnapped. Superintendent Victoire Eberhart discovers that the man who has been pulling the strings since the beginning is none other than Paul, her lieutenant and Laurent's best friend.

programme.title: In Ivan Claes' trunk, Laurent discovers a bloody towel and Marina's bracelet. He gives them to Paul for analysis, but the latter burns them. Laurent drags him into the forest, ready to kill him if he won't tell him where his daughter is buried. But Paul isn't the murderer...
programme.desc: In Ivan Claes' trunk, Laurent discovers a bloody towel and Marina's bracelet. He gives them to Paul for analysis, but the latter burns them. Laurent drags him into the forest, ready to kill him if he won't tell him where his daughter is buried. But Paul isn't the murderer...

programme.title: ''Temps Présent'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: It's finally time for our three hopefuls to say farewell. The moment has come for them to set off for their new life. And for everyone, this long-awaited moment suddenly becomes solemn as they realise they are about to turn an important page in their lives.
